inclusion.criterion: Positive family anamnesis for Hypophosphatasia disease
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: No Informed consent from the patient or the parents before any study related procedures.
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients of both gender younger than 2 month
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has a confirmed diagnosis of Paget's Disease of Bone and is starting Bisphosphonate therapy. Their sister had the same problems at age 52.
